v8:item.v8:content: Used to indicate the document currency
Products item prices added to the tabular section will be of the selected type
Cash register for which sale is registered
Comment to the document is specified
Company for which sale is registered
Information about the employee responsible for entering the current document
Retail outlet from which inventories are written off
VAT taxation type of the goods and services sale
If the check box is selected, VAT will be included in the document amount
If the check box is selected, then VAT will be included in cost when posting
Document discount will be of the selected kind
List of products expense of which is displayed in this document
Products item whose expense is shown in the current document
If it is necessary, the characteristic of products is specified in this field
Products item quantity to be sold
Unit of measure of the products item.
Cost of products of this line
VAT amount of the specified row.
Information about the employee responsible for entering the current document
Field populated automatically with the total inventory cost according to the settings of prices and currencies
The percentage of automatic discount for the line.
Amount of all automatic discounts for a receipt line calculated according to the mutual influence rules.
Link ID of the Goods tabular section row and Discounts (mark-ups) tabular section row. Generated automatically, cannot be edited by user.
List of payments by payment cards
Card type using which the transaction was performed
Number of payment card using which the transaction was carried out
Discount which is applied to this order
Products item whose expense is shown in the current document
If it is necessary, the characteristic of products is specified in this field
